DOC.brief_summary: An Open-Label , Single-Dose , Mass-Balance Study Assess Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion Radio Labeled SPN-810M Healthy Adult Male Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Assess Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion 14C Labeled SPN-810M
DOC.criteria: Key Entry : 1 . Healthy male . 2 . Aged 30 55 year . 3 . Considered medically healthy Investigator via assessment physical examination , medical history , clinical laboratory test , urinalysis , vital sign , electrocardiogram . 4 . Able voluntarily provide write informed consent participate study .
